description.value:
Your divine ally radiates power, enhancing your chosen weapon.

When you choose the weapon for your blade ally during your daily preparations, add the following property runes to the list of effects you can choose from: @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Flaming]{Flaming} and any aligned properties (@UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Anarchic]{Anarchic}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Axiomatic]{Axiomatic}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Holy]{Holy}, or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Unholy]{Unholy}) that match your cause's alignment.

@UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feat-effects.Effect: Blade Ally]{Effect: Blade Ally}
